item.description:
UPDATE: There will be an "after-party" at Murphy's taproom in Manchester. Come join us to celebrate.

Come help Ron Paul win the Manchester Straw Poll! These polls help draw media attention, so they are crucial to helping Dr Paul.

Straw Poll tickets are $10 per person and includes lunch. An individual can purchase up to 25 tickets, however, there still has to be a body with each ticket in order to vote in the straw poll. Only NH residents will be allowed to vote. Tickets will be available for purchase online in a few days (www.manchestergop.com).

Event runs from noon till 6pm, at Veterans Park in Manchester.
item.name: Manchester GOP Straw Poll
